data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 365 believers in Hodh ech Chargui to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Hodh ech Chargui, Mauritania
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Hodh ech Chargui, Mauritania from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.section_summary: On average, 24 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Hodh ech Chargui, Mauritania.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, defend the church in the state of Hodh ech Chargui against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 365 believers find a person of peace today among the 298,235 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Bambara people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Bambara people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Bambara people is yours.
Spirit, help the church in the state of Hodh ech Chargui do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Hodh ech Chargui to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 298,600 people living in Hodh ech Chargui through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.
